item.title: 0842 VALE
item.description: score:842 Chances: The $2.6 billion deal with Saudi Arabia marks a potential landmark shift in the metal and mining investment landscape, indicating Saudi Arabia’s entry as a pivotal player. Vale’s agreement to sell a 13% stake in its base metals business for $3.
